citations.narrative:
There were records indicating the date(s) the canine parvovirus and distemper vaccines were last administered to the
adult dogs. Licensee is currently vaccinating adult dogs once or twice a year for parvovirus and distemper. Failure to
maintain and keep records on the names and dates of all vaccines administered makes it difficult to evaluate when these
vaccines were last given. Licensee must ensure that records are maintained for all vaccines and treatments administered
and the the dates of administration. Correct by February 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were records indicating the date(s) the canine parvovirus and distemper vaccines were last administered to the 
adult dogs. Licensee is currently vaccinating adult dogs once or twice a year for parvovirus and distemper. Failure to 
maintain and keep records on the names and dates of all vaccines administered makes it difficult to evaluate when these 
vaccines were last given. Licensee must ensure that records are maintained for all vaccines and treatments administered 
and the the dates of administration. Correct by February 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
